# affectedStores

**Instance Property**

The stores the request should be sent to.

## Declaration

```swift
var affectedStores: [NSPersistentStore]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The array contains instances of [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSPersistentStore].

## Related Documentation

- **Core Data Programming Guide**

## Configuring a Request

- **requestType**: The type of the fetch request.
- **NSPersistentStoreRequestType**: Constants that specify the types of fetch requests.
